title: I LOVE a good clown fiesta
body:
I am in Silver. I don't ever plan to be a god at this game, I don't plan to be some grand strategist or mechanical monster.

I plan to live out my League days having fun, and nothing is more fun than a grand ol' clown fiesta. Where you bust out laughing because of the idiocy of it all. Win or lose, it is always fun to throw everything you have at a good old fashioned scrap.

I will say though, some times my Silver brethren surprise me. Sometimes a play goes so perfectly that I forget how bad I am. I also enjoy those moments.
